mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO news(_id,来源网站,网址,分类,金融分类,下载日期,发布日期,标题,转自,原标题,编辑记者,原网站链接,extra_info,摘要,文本内容,网页源码) VALUES
(#{userinfo.id}, #{userinfo.sourceSite}, #{ userinfo.internetSite}, #{userinfo.classification}, #{userinfo.financialClassification}, #{userinfo.downloadDate}, #{userinfo.releaseDate}, #{userinfo.title}, #{userinfo.transferFrom}, #{userinfo.originalTitle}, #{userinfo.editingReporter}, #{userinfo.originalWebsiteLink}, #{userinfo.extrainfo}, #{userinfo.summary}, #{userinfo.textContent}, #{userinfo.webPageSourceCode})
